# ðŸ‘‹Hello There!

I'm Harikesh Kushwaha, an alumni of Indian Institute of Technology Delhi (IITD) with a deep passion for Machine Learning (ML) and Deep Learning (DL). Currently, I am working as a Data Scientist at Nuvoretail. My academic and professional journey has equipped me with a solid foundation in ML and DL algorithms, techniques, and frameworks. I have practical experience in developing and implementing ML models, optimizing performance, and analyzing large datasets. Additionally, I possess knowledge of finance and have worked on projects in portfolio optimization and option pricing models.

ðŸ’» Besides ML and DL, I also have a keen interest in web development. I enjoy building interactive and user-friendly web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like React.js. This combination of skills allows me to develop end-to-end solutions leveraging ML and DL in user-facing applications. Throughout my academic and personal projects, I have worked on diverse problem domains such as image classification, sentiment analysis, and recommendation systems. Please see my skill-set [below](#skill-set) for a detailed list of my technical skills.

ðŸŒŸ I believe in continuous learning and keeping up with the latest advancements in ML, DL, and web development. My goal is to leverage my skills and knowledge in ML, DL, finance, and web development to develop innovative solutions for real-world challenges. I am enthusiastic about collaborating with like-minded individuals and teams to tackle challenging problems and drive meaningful change. You can contact me via the social links provided [below](#social). I'm always open to exciting opportunities, collaborations, or engaging discussions related to ML and DL!
